Package mindustry.game

Class MapObjectives

java.lang.Object
mindustry.game.MapObjectives
All Implemented Interfaces:
arc.util.Eachable<MapObjectives.MapObjective>, Iterable<MapObjectives.MapObjective>
public class MapObjectives extends Object implements Iterable<MapObjectives.MapObjective>, arc.util.Eachable<MapObjectives.MapObjective>
Handles and executes in-map objectives.
